data.title: THE JERRY LEWIS SHOW (1963)
data.meta_description: motion picture |   Made-for-TV series.   Feature film (over 60 minutes).   2. "What kind of fool am I?" by Leslie Bricusse, Anthony Newley. (Songs).   1. In segment (21.09.63) Harry James. 2. In segment (26.10.63) Peggy Lee, vocal. 3. In segment (21.12.63) Bill Richmond. (Personnel On Camera).   Bill Richmond was co-writer of numerous shows.   Motion Picture (Form).
